query.sql: SELECT l.line_id, ifnull(l.description,'Not-Submit (未提交)') description, l.score, l.teacher_comment, l.grade, (select count(1) from sys_upload_file f where f.table_name ='job_lines' and pk_value = line_id) att_num, concat(concat(s.student_code,'-'),s.student_name) student_name FROM fnd_student s left join (select * from job_lines l where l.status != 'NEW' AND l.header_id = ${@header_id}) l on l.student_id = s.student_id where s.class_id =(select h.class_id from job_headers h where h.header_id = ${@header_id}) order by s.student_code

query.name: checkData
query.sql: SELECT l.line_id, ifnull(l.description,'Not-Submit (未提交)') description, l.score, l.teacher_comment, l.grade, (select count(1) from sys_upload_file f where f.table_name ='job_lines' and pk_value = line_id) att_num, concat(concat(s.student_code,'-'),s.student_name) student_name FROM fnd_student s ,job_lines l where l.status != 'NEW' AND l.header_id = ${@header_id} and l.student_id = s.student_id order by s.student_code

sqls.executeSql: update job_lines set grade =${@grade}, score =${@score}, teacher_comment=${@teacher_comment}, last_update_by=${@user_id}, last_update_date =NOW() where line_id = ${@line_id}
